file_content.text: Things are really turning around out here, all thanks to you!
You did it! Everyone's been talking to the major about the work you've been doing--he's calling off the evacuation!
I'll report in with the good news, but you should go back and talk to Strom at the spaceport. He and the governor will want to thank you themselves!
Stay safe, pal.
You can't do this, Major! The governor even sent us more help--look!
The governor has sent us plenty of help already. Volunteers, mercs, even Jedi, and they're all dead or working on it.
I'm not watching the body count go any higher. We're pulling out--ASAP. You want to help, help us load up for evac.
This work is too important to abandon.
That isn't an option.
That's not your call to make.
It's natural to feel afraid, Major. But don't let that blind you to hope.
Don't give in to your fear.
I'm no coward, Jedi. I've got lives to save.
No need for evac, Major, sir. We can still win this.
Don't give up.
I'll take your five-second tactical appraisal under advisement while we strike camp, Lieutenant.
The governor is paying to get the job finished, not to pack it up and head home.
I wasn't hired to help load.
I hope she's paying well.
Does Governor Saresh know you're pulling out?
What about the governor?
She's not here--we are.
I guess we'll have to save this project without your help.
Running away so soon?
If you want to get yourself eaten or turned into a monster, go right ahead.
Anything and anyone that isn't packed when we leave is meat. Your choice.
You'll have to work quickly to get this place safe and running again before the major's evacuation. Maybe then he'll change his mind.
Talk to any of the people here--they'll tell you what needs to be done. I just hope we're not too late.
We won't let all this work go to waste, Vealo.
Don't worry.
Looks like the governor knew what she was doing when she sent you here.
Do whatever you have to, Vealo--don't let him take these people out of here.
Keep the major busy.
I'll see what I can do.
You should be backing us up, Major, not running away.
This is ridiculous.
My orders are to keep these people safe. If you work a miracle and this place ends up being safe again... we'll see.
Good luck to you.
This... isn't a good time.
